data.story:
You're... The one from the letters...?
Indeed. I am 「Clown Alpha」. But now that we are meeting like this... I guess a proper introduction is in order. My name is 「Otto Apocalypse」.
The current Overseer of Schicksal. Don't stay there. How about you come in and warm yourself?
Otto... Apocalypse? Hahaha, that's right. If I am lying I give you permission to hit me. Otto Apocalypse. Within my organization no one dares to say my name... hahaha. (He's the person H.A. was talking about in her Soulium Sphere recording...?) (But... wasn't that over 100 years ago?) (Then he is... the second or third generation?) (Also he looks incredibly young...)
...You've probably heard nasty rumors about me, yes? That's the sort of rumors that follow me. Of course some of them are true, but others are like smoke without fire. But none of that matters.
I didn't come here to see you as the Overseer―― ――But to leave the pen names behind and expose it all.
..... Then, what do you want?
「O dear friend, do not be nervous.」
...Haha, I shouldn't be talking like a playwright right now. I believe it'll help you relax a little if I tell you my intentions directly―― 「Welt」, I want you to be Otto Apocalypse's successor.
What I mean by that, is that once I retire I want you to become the next Overseer of Schicksal. What do you say?
Wha... What are you saying?
Ah... I can't blame you for being surprised by such a blunt request.
You must know the 「Apocalypse」 family doesn't care about blood bonds. From ancient times to the present, the Apocalypse have taken in the most powerful people in the world. So if you wanted... You could join the Apocalypse family right now and become my sworn brother.
Eh...? ...Are you serious?
It's natural for you think it's weird given that this is our first meeting.
But I don't care about that sort of things... I've been observing you all this time as the head of the Apocalypse family. You are my opposite. There is no doubt you'll become a great leader one day.
...The opposite? What do you mean?
Hahaha. Your perspective is truly interesting, unlike everyone else's.
To be honest, I believe I'm a failure as the Overseer.
Because I became the Overseer for my own personal gain―― But that doesn't matter now.
What matters now is... you, the 「exceptionally talented」 successor I am looking for. ...Me? talented?
Yes. You're exceptionally talented. Your talent is one that hasn't bloomed yet―― It's natural that you would think of yourself as such a hopeless person. Now let me ask you a question.
You've read a lot of books over the past two years―― ――So in your opinion, among our long lasting civilization, who deserves to be truly called 「exceptional」? ..... Don't think too deeply about it, just say what comes to your mind. There is no right or wrong answer in a talk between friends.
..... I think you overestimate me but if you really want me to answer, I could name countless celebrities. 「If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of Giants.」 ―How's Newton?
Hahaha. Wasn't she just making fun of others? Newton's insight into mathematics was certainly unparalleled... But in terms of being 「exceptional」, I think she doesn't even come close to Shakespeare.
..... Shakespeare? You think the person who wrote 「To Be or Not to Be」 is worthy of being called exceptional?
Hahaha... All she did was to line up the world's suffering in a neat manner and showed it to the people. Her way of looking at things was different from everyone else, but she didn't have a single bit of sympathy within her.
...... Going by your logic, theorists don't leave their own fields, while writers are cold hearted to be able to come up with many different conflicts... In that case, what about religious leaders who encourage people to do good... for example, Gautama Buddha?
Sigh... So in the end we end up with the ancestors of the Apocalypse family.
H-He's your ancestor? Yes... but if I tell you all about it, we won't be done even after three days and three nights.
CG15-14.jpg
In short, he couldn't keep up with his own feelings, he couldn't see the big picture or even what was below him―― I couldn't possibly call someone like that exceptional.
...You sure have high standards. Then what about the father of modern Russia, Peter 1―― He earnestly tried to make his country a better place. Peter was certainly a strong willed person... but it was his fault many innocent people died. A truly exceptional person must avoid all unnecessary bloodshed. ..... Nightingale, the woman known as the 「The White Angel」 who reformed the medical system. She had indeed exceptional qualities... but working in her area of expertise for her entire life prevented her from growing in other areas. .....
I can think of many others like Adam Smith, Darwin, Carl Clausewitz... But due to your impossibly high standards no one can be called an 「exceptionally talented person」. Exactly. All of them were smart individuals capable of shacking the status quo within their specialty.... But when it came to other fields, they were unable to put their knowledge to good use. ...Do you think I can do what those people couldn't?
I can't guarantee it, but yes. As far as intellect is concerned, you're certainly not a match for any of them. But you posses something none of them had. Something they didn't have...?
Yes... Think about who you are surrounding yourself with these days. The most intelligent person ever recorded, Einstein. The most destructive inventor ever known, Tesla. The most unconventional physicist of our time, Planck.
The most powerful Valkyrie of Schicksal, Brigantia.
And there is also the 「Sage」 you've met today, Fu Hua. They all think highly of you, don't you think so? E-Eh... Do they really... Haha... Seriously, you yourself is the only one who hasn't noticed.
How should I phrase this... Among us, the only one who can connect with all 5 of them.... Is none other than you. Eh...?
You don't get it? A truly exceptional person is not one who stands out in one particular area... But one who can connect with those outstanding people to bring forth their true potential.
And you, as far as I'm aware, are the closest to be that kind of exceptional person. You're a person worth nurturing. ..... Shouldn't a person like me know their place and live within his limits?
Ahahaha... if I'm the most carnivorous of all, you are the most herbivorous of all!
Note:
Carnivore refers to a type of people who passionately pursue societal progress, actively chase fame and fortune, and are very emotional.
Herbivores refers to another type of people who are introverted, frugal in consumption, unambitions, detached from worldly affairs, and content with an ordinary life.
Herbivore...? Carnivore...? Haha... Nevermind that.
What I'm trying to say is, the intrinsic factors humans beings are made of is not only their personality and disposition―― Human nature is determined mostly by ontology.
注：
本体论（Ontology）是形而上学（Metaphysics）的基本分支，主要探讨存在本身，即一切现实事物的本质特征。
在信息科学中，“本体”特指任何“形式化的，对于共享概念体系的明确而又详细的说明”。例如，一本书籍的版本记录信息，在图书检索系统中，可以视为该书籍的“本体”。
Ontology? Despite its name it's nothing too mysterious.
I've been alive for over 500 years.... and after all this time my ontology is insignificant compared to the one of the 「Saint」.
5-500 years?
Nothing to be surprised about... All I did was to make a deal with the devil. Besides... You won't need to make a deal like that in the first place.
Y-You mean... Yes, you'll be able to live for 500 years much easier than me. But that's a talk for another day.
What I want you to know, is that under the right guidance―― Your ontology can be 100 times stronger than mine. Mine? stronger than yours?
That's right. You are, indeed, stronger than me. Are you not aware? Your ontology no longer... belongs to a single person... ...But to humanity as a 「whole」. My ontology... humanity as a 「whole」?
「If we have chosen the position in life in which we can most of all work for mankind,」 「No burdens can bow us down, because they are sacrifices for the benefit of all.」 「Then we shall experience no petty, limited, selfish joy」 「But our happiness will belong to millions.」 「Our deeds will live on quietly but perpetually at work,」 「And over our ashes will be shed the hot tears of noble people」
注：
这段文字是《青年在选择职业时的考虑》的最后一段。
作者是一位名为【卡尔·马克思】的17岁少年——在此后的人生中，他将努力实践这个看起来似乎有些“中二”的理念。
――Doesn't it make you jealous someone is able to spout such inspiring words? Doesn't it make you want to be an 「Ally of Justice」 and keep the cycle going?
.....
Ah... It's been 10 years since the World War ended... Places outside of London are still having electrical problems? ..... Wait here―― I'll go ask the owner for something to light up the place. ...No need.
...Hm? If you are really trying to convince me to do something... Stop only concerning about yourself.
You don't understand anything, Mister Overseer. ..... Did I... say something that offended you? ..... No, you didn't say anything wrong. But that's precisely why―― ――That I find it hard to believe you. ..... I see. Then... I hope time will give us the answers we seek. ..... Well then. ..... Let us meet again, my friend.
(...Welt-sama, please wait a moment.) ...Who's there?
